## Description
A 24 V precision motor provides precise positioning, &#10;&#9;&#9;such as 3D printers and CNC machines, where they can move in small, &#10;&#9;&#9;controlled increments.&#10;&#9;&#9;

| Attribute      | Value |

|Mass:|1.0 kg|
|Type:|Electrical|
